item.title: TripAdvisor has identified Tokyo, Singapore, and Dubai as some of the top choices in its Cities Survey
item.description:
Singapore at night. The travel website TripAdvisor recently published its second annual Cities Survey, which collected data from over 54,000 user reviews. The survey evaluated cities worldwide based on traveler feedback. Tokyo received the highest ranking for providing the best overall travel experience. It also earned top scores for its helpful residents, taxi services, public transportation, and clean streets. Tokyo ranked among the top ten cities in 13 out of 16 survey categories...

item.title: Social media holds greater significance for customer experience than phone calls or email
item.description:
Source: Genesys infographic. A recent study by Genesys, a customer experience and contact center solutions provider, found that over one-third (37%) of Asia Pacific businesses now consider social media a critical channel for customer experience (CX). While in-person interactions remain the top CX channel, the study highlights that social media has surpassed phone and email in importance. item.title: Discover the hidden secrets of Balinese sarongs with the Sarong Concierge program at the Ritz-Carlton Bali
item.description:
The Ritz-Carlton, Bali has introduced a new program called the Sarong Concierge to enhance its immersive cultural experiences. Guests can participate in this half-day journey led by Tresna Dewi, the resort’s Sarong Concierge, to learn about various Balinese textiles and their creation. Known as ‘kamen’ in Balinese, these fabrics are transformed into beautiful, intricately made sarongs.
